price: او الله لره د آسمانونو او ځمكې لښكرې دي او الله برلاسى حكمت والا دى.
arabic: وَلِلَّهِ جُنُودُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَزِيزًا حَكِيمًا

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: walillahi junūdu al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wakāna al-lahu ʿazīzan ḥakīman
